camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.bucketNameOr.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.bucketNameOrArn
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.bucketNameOr.description: The S3 Bucket name or ARN

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.accessKey.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.accessKey.description: The access key obtained from AWS

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.secretKey.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.secretKey.description: The secret key obtained from AWS

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.region.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.region
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.region.description: The AWS region to connect to Example: eu-west-1

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.autoCreateBu.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.autoCreateBucket
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.autoCreateBu.description: Setting the autocreation of the S3 bucket bucketName.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.includeBody.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.includeBody
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-source.includeBody.description: If it is true, the exchange will be consumed and put into the body and closed. If false the S3Object stream will be put raw into the body and the headers will be set with the S3 object metadata.
